reviews.text: We have been with Aireserv for over 15yrs and I can’t begin to tell you how wonderful Cindy is! She has been the voice on the other end of the phone for all these years, she knows me and is able to answer my questions and always able to get a tech to my house whenever we need them. They have been there for me when we had a terrible system and needed upgrading but couldn’t afford it and also when we had a new one they did the maintenance on it. Now we have a new system with Aireserv and it was on

We’ve been using Air Serve for a couple years now to ensure that our AC works properly. Chandler has serviced our home several times now and has made the proper recommendations based on our needs with long term solutions in mind. We always appreciate hi knowledge, professionalism and genuine friendliness. We can tell he really cares about his customers and it’s always a pleasure to know that he’s the one assigned to our home. We’ve had another gentleman service our home as well and he along with

I highly recommend Aire Serv. I’ve been using their services for about 15 years, and every time there’s an issue, they respond quickly and ensure everything is back up and running smoothly.

Most recently, my A/C stopped working on a Thursday night around 8 PM. I called them the next morning at 9 AM, and by noon, it was up and running again.

I've had the same technician, Chandler, for the past few visits. He’s always professional, knowledgeable, and friendly—exactly the kind of service you want

My wife and I recently came home from the hospital with our 2 day old newborn just to be welcomed with our air conditioner not working and the house at 80 degrees. I called Aireserv and explained the circumstances. From start to finish Aireserv was professional, courteous and very understanding of the circumstances I was in. Within an hour Chandler arrived out our house and had the problem troubleshooting complete. Chandler informed me that he would find the replacement blower motor first thing

I recently had an outstanding experience with Aire Serv Heating and Air of Fort Worth, and I couldn't be happier with their service! As a homeowner, dealing with a broken AC in the Texas heat is a nightmare, but Aire Serv made the whole process incredibly smooth.

I scheduled service online after business hours, and to my surprise, I received a call back within 30 minutes. The scheduling was fast and easy, which was a huge relief.

Cayden, the air conditioning technician, was at my home in less

AireServ has provided service maintenance and repair to my Concord 5 ton system for a couple of years and I’ve been very happy with their friendly service techs, latest being Raylen, who took the time to answer all my questions beforebI made decisions on optional services for my 9-yr-old unit. Their office assistant was also very helpful in contract discussions.  I highly recommend and trust this company based on service so far.

I had a fantastic experience with Aire Serv. After calling for AC issues, they were here within a couple of hours. Chandler was so informative, professional, and fast. It was painless and I sincerely appreciated the service! So grateful for a working unit so fast on such a hot day.

We’ve been with Airserv for over a decade. About 6 months age we had a new Armstrong system installed. Today I noticed an error screen on our thermostat so I called Aireserv and Chandler came by to check it out. He’s really personable and he did a great job explaining our system. All is well with our system.
Chandler has made several calls to our house over the last few years with our old system (also purchased from Aireserv). There was no charge for the visit under warranty.

All the people at

Another OUTSTANDING service call from the folks at Aire Serv to take care of my clients! Kenny efficiently diagnosed the problem and gave me all the info I needed to inform my client. He was then on time and corrected the issue. He also too precaution to respect my client's home for cleanliness. I appreciate smart people doing their BEST. Thank you to all at Aire Serv!

I highly recommend Aire Serv Air Conditioning of Fort Worth. My husband and I purchased a new system from them a few years ago and have been incredibly happy that we did. Aire Serv’s customer service is “Top Notch!” All of their service technicians are outstanding. Today we were so very impressed with their service tech “Cayden” who came out for our routine maintenance inspection. He was very knowledgeable, courteous, polite, professional and extremely thorough. He provided us with the most exce
Raylen from AirServ was so helpful and responsive with my old, failing HVAC.  He took the time to explain the issues with my system and was very courteous.  I am very appreciative of his help!

Aire Serv takes great care of their customers! They installed my air conditioner and currently do maintenance checks every 6 months. The technicians are personable and do a thorough job when installing or doing maintenance checks.
Kayden is awesome. He thoroughly explained each step and showed great customer service!

Gas leak nitrogen test $650 way overpriced compared to competitors.
They did an appointment from 8am to 12
And didn’t arrive till 4:30pm after I called many times. The guy said I’ll give you “free” freeon while I give you a quote next day for the fix.
He never put freeon, it was a lie - house was hotter as before plus I never received an updated quote that supposed to come the next day. (It’s been 2 days) - original estimated quote $5K again way overpriced- average is $1K to $2.7K
Won’t recommen
The folks at AireServ, have been excellent working with no complaints. Just got my AC,  but so for so good. Thanks to Chandler, Kenny, Joe & Eddy.  Cheers. em……*

Always a pleasure
Our technician, Cayden, was very friendly and professional. They only do what is necessary, not trying to upsell you on stuff that you don’t need. They are our goto A/C people

Fantastic people that actually want to help you and not just charge you for random things. They go out of their way to make you comfortable and make sure you understand everything they are doing. Will definitely use them again!!
Chandler was on time and did an awesome job on my maintenance today.  He also answered my questions concerning the humidity in the house.  I appreciate his knowledge and professionalism.

I’m very satisfied with the work Chandler did for us. He went beyond and we were elated.
He worked with us during our time of need. ❤️
It was great!!! your technician Kenny is fantastic. Can’t say thank you enough as usual you guys are great.!

Raylen and Aireserv were awesome.  They were quick to respond and upfront about the issues, resolution, and pricing.  Raylen spent time explaining the issues and recommendations.  I have never worked with a better HVAC company.

I have been a customer of AireServ for many years. Throughout this whole time every tech that they have sent to my house has been excellent. I say the same thing about Cayden. He was very professional, knowledgeable, courageous and presentable. I recommend Cayden and AireServ very highly.

Michael arrived on time, we discussed the options that met my HVAC needs and wants. The date for the installation was set. The installation team arrived at the scheduled time, and went to work. The install was quick, but the quality was the best I have seen in a residential installation. A steel frame was built and suspended on cables to provide a strong stable platform for the interior unit. Much better than the metal tape or lumber used by many companies. The duct connections were sealed using
Great service, timely and they’re really adamant by making sure they service you for the level of the experience you paid for
Aire Serv installed my Daikin 24000btu mini split in my garage and did a great job. I would highly recommend them. Call Bryan and get yours installed before the triple digits hit.

Service representative came out for a routine spring checkup on our HVAC. He was quite professional in carrying out his duties. When done, he answered any other questions we may have had about our HVAC unit. Very friendly and courteous!
Another outstanding job by Aireserv and its technician Chandler. Thanks for the preventative maintenance suggestions and for keeping our units running smoothly. 👍 …
Prompt and informative in a very busy season. Kenny was professional, knowledgeable and a great ambassador for your company.
I am extremely pleased with  your team .Every request was executed with a site visit an estimate and a perfectly done job with a ton of input.   Your team is the best!
Excellent experience with Aireserv.  Always on time and courageous. Chandler is knowledgeable and efficient.  Great experience and highly recommend.

Another outstanding maintenance appointment! I have been a customer since our move to Texas in 2008.  Kenny is great! He takes the time to explain the process and outcomes of the maintenance needs, and is very professional and knowledgeable.  I would highly recommend them.

We’ve used Aire Serv for a couple years now. Over the last year or so we’ve known that we would need to replace our AC unit system. So this past week Kenny came out and serviced our 12 year old unit and explained to us how much it would cost to try to keep it working. We decided it was best to go ahead and install a whole new AC unit. Kenny took the time to explain everything with us. Then we scheduled to have Kenny come out on Friday November 1st. Well on Wednesday afternoon our old system went
I have NEVER had a bad experience with this company, Aire Serve.  They have always been friendly, knowledgeable and very helpful.

Was recommended by my neighbor to give them a shot that they were a trustworthy company. And I have to say they are very honest very trustworthy. They make sure to get the job done right. They also make sure before you start spending tons of money on your HVAC system that you actually have a correct diagnosis of what you need. Bryon and Kenny were super dope and took their time. Explain everything to me.

Aire Serv saved the day. I frequently leave reviews but rarely add commentary especially long commentary but this situation calls for it. Once I reached out to Aire Serv, they responded quickly to my request for service and when another customer rescheduled, they called me right back to see if they could arrive earlier than originally scheduled. They did a fantastic job communicating with me and kept me informed of the issues with my air conditioner. The technician took a video of the problem in

Every tine we have had an issue, they're right there to help us out.  They are trustworthy and communicate well about your issues. Kenny came out for an issue today - he made us a real priority, and he explained what was going on in a way my mechanical-naive brain could understand. In the TX heat, having someone you know will have the knowledge, experience and compassion to do do everything they can to keep you from having to go to a hotel (or with my medical situation, the hospital) provides a
Very good company. Installed a new unit with warranty. I would definitely recommend this company.

I have been with Aire Serv for almost 5 years and they have been excellent in helping with my heating and cooling needs. Their customer service is top tier as are their technicians. I appreciate that they strive to fix the root problems rather than slapping a bandaid on the issue. They are very upfront with pricing and give options depending on price point.

A++. This company is the best in DFW. Wish I could give them 10 🌟!!! From the salesman and to the crew. All were very professional and knowledgeable and the install was very fast. I greatly appreciate all that was done for us. Definitely my go to for all my AC needs & highly recommend to anyone who needs service. …
We’ve been using these folks for years and after another biannual checkup we’re good to go. Chandler was a total pro and explained what he did and made sure he answered all our questions. Thank you!

Jeremy was phenomenal. He was professional and thorough, walked us through the repairs and explained it all in detail. He arrived ahead of schedule and worked efficiently. The best AC service we've had. Thank you.

I used Aire Serv last year to install two mini split systems. They have been a life saver for a room that I can never keep at the right temperature. I recently decided to make an adjustment to one of them. Kenny was amazing by keeping in contact with me, providing different opinions and installing on a rainy Saturday. So happy with the service!

AC quit working and I called AireServ and they sent Kenny out promptly.  He diagnosed and explained what the problem was.  The cost of repair was pretty expensive and as the unit was 12 years old I decided to go with a replacement.  While he was there he called and got the price of a new HVAC system. It was reasonable in price so I decided to go with a complete new system.

Aire Serve is such a great company. When looking over reviews on Angie's List, I paid close attention to those about INSTALLING air conditioners, not just servicing them. (It's a fail if you buy a great unit, but they screw up the installation.) Their sales person explained to me the different choices and recommended the most affordable option. They even filed my warranty for me, which was great because I forgot. It's been running smoothly for years. This evening has been the first I've had a pr

The staff from the office to the crew were very friendly, personable, also professional and knew what they were doing. Communication and information was excellent, so refreshing. The gentlemen that came to do the work made me feel very comfortable, and truly enjoyed their presence. They explained everything, and even showed me videos of what they did. They are one of few companies that work with mobile homes any more, and they did not hesitate to work on ours. They truly take pride in their work

I have used Aire Serv for a number of years.  They installed my new unit and regularly come out and check out everything to make sure all is great.  Jeremy, the technician always is in contact when he is coming.  He is very friendly and works hard to make sure everything is in great shape.  I have never had a problem with this company and would always use their services.  Communication is extremely important!

AireServ put out AC in our house about 5 years ago and did an awesome job. They helped us so much on maintenance and making sure we were comfortable with our purchase. We use them for service calls and refer them every chance we get.

Talked to Cindy at the office, and she scheduled someone to come out that afternoon. She was an actual joy to speak to! Jeremy was running AHEAD of schedule (when does that ever happen?) and replaced a part in less than 20 minutes that had us back to cold air before the baby’s nap time. He educated me on how to clean the outside of the unit, and how regular tune ups would make a difference. Would recommend times a thousand!

I am very please to let you know my experience with this company and their employees. My service professional today was Justin. He was polite, knowledgeable and efficient. I highly recommend both the company and Justin.

We had an emergency over the summer and called Air Serv. A technician, Kenny, came out in the middle of the night. He was full of energy, kind, and knew how to quickly fix the problem. He did so well that we signed up for a service membership. Today, we had a 6 month service. Kenny came out again and was great as always. 10/10 recommend!
